name: Elbow Support
descr: The Chiroform Elbow Support helps relieve pain. For acute pain and for prevention of elbow problems. The Chiroform Elbow Support specifically protects and supports the elbow joint. It is easy to put on and maintains its shape. The elbow joint is involved in almost all handd and finger movements. Overuse and excessive stretchning may result in pain. Suitable for all-day and long-term use. Wash by hand. Can be used for right and left elbow. Excellent fit due to patented knitted design. Highly elastic wave knit. Mild compression of approx. 20-25 mmHg.
